snippet.title: Black Clover - Opening 3 | Black Rover (Blinding Sunrise Cover)
snippet.description:
Black Clover - Opening 3 | Black Rover (Blinding Sunrise Cover)

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel for more videos!
Buy our merch here ➡ https://www.blindingsunrisestore.com

Mixed by Blinding Sunrise
Mastered by Mike Kalajian 
Video Shooting by Danilo Inghilterra
Video Editing and Post Production by Blinding Sunrise
Original Artist : Vickeblanka/ビッケブランカ 

Special thanks goes to Chiesa e Chiostro di Santa Maria del Gesù for the location
https://www.facebook.com/s.mariadelgesu/

FOLLOW US ON 

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/blindingsunrise
Twitter : https://twitter.com/blindingsunrise
Instagram : @blindingsunrise
TikTok : @blindingsunrise

LYRICS : 

Tanjun na stage
Kawaku hodo negai
Mizu ga ito wo tsutai
Dareka ni kanau konnan na stage
Choujo wo shimesu moyou
Suiheisen ga chuu wo mau
Nando kujikaretemo

Sono kibou wo ryoute ni
Bokura nami wo utte
Tsubasa wo miseru to sakebun da

Get down
We all let you know this time
Can you bring me down
Back up, gets far of the sky, black rover

Itsuka tomo ni miyou
Ima wa kuro ni someyou
Konna fuzaketa jidai black rover

Nankai mo play
Mieru no ni minai
Tameshitemo minai
Dare ga aganau
Mukanshin na play

It's just when the light shines strong
It doesn't matter if there's gleam or gloom
Like a star that's shining bright in the night
Catch the void that darkens in the light

Sono kibou wo ryoute ni
Bokura nami wo utte
Tsubasa wo misero to sakebun da

Get down
We all let you know this time
Can you bring me down
Back up, gets far of the sky, black rover

Itsuka tomo ni miyou
Ima wa kuro ni someyou
Konna fuzaketa jidai black rover

Kuukyou no aida ni bokura narabitatte
Ima kara tobira wo hiraku kara

Just open your eyes like us
Just open your hearts like us
Just open the world like us
We know we are reckless
Just open your eyes like us
Just open your hearts like us
Just open the world like us
Don't stay, don't blame!
Get far!

Get down
We all let you know this time
Can you bring me down
Back up, gets far of the sky, black rover

Itsuka tomo ni miyou
Ima wa kuro ni someyou
Konna fuzaketa jidai black rover

Kuukyou no aida ni bokura narabitatte
Ima kara tobira wo hiraku kara

Let's go next stage

____________________________________________


単純なステージ
渇くほど願い 水が糸を伝い
誰かにかなう困難なステージ
頂上を示す模様
水平線が宙を舞う
何度くじかれても
その希望を両手に 僕ら波を打って
つばさをみせろと叫ぶんだ
get down
we all let you know this time
can you bring me down
back up, get far of the sky, black rover
いつかともにみよう
今は黒に染めよう
こんなふざけた時代
black rover
何回も play
見えるのに見ない ためしてもみない
誰があがなう無関心な play
It's just when the light shines strong
It doesn't matter if there's gleam or gloom
Like a star that's shining bright in the night
Catch the void that darkens in the light
その希望を両手に
僕ら波を打って
つばさをみせろと叫ぶんだ
get down
we all let you know this time
can you bring me down
back up, get far of the sky, black rover
いつかともにみよう
今は黒に染めよう
こんなふざけた時代
black rover
空虚の間に僕ら並び立って
今から扉を開くから
just open your eyes like us
just open your hearts like us
just open the world like us
we know we are reckless
just open your eyes like us
just open your hearts like us
just open the world like us
dont stay, dont blame!
get far
get down
we all let you know this time
can you bring me down
back up, get far of the sky, black rover
いつかともにみよう
今は黒に染めよう
こんなふざけた時代
black rover

今から扉を開くから
